sentences.sContent: If not, anhydrous alcohol and carbon tetrachloride are feasible.
sentences.sContent_eng: If not, anhydrous alcohol and carbon tetrachloride are feasible.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有，无水酒精和四氯化碳都是可行的。

sentences.sContent: Fuel blends containing gasoline, anhydrous methanol and some solvents have been developed and used for automobile engines.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fuel blends containing gasoline, anhydrous methanol and some solvents have been developed and used for automobile engines.
sentences.sCn: 汽油、无水甲醇与某些溶剂的混合液已被用作汽车发动机的燃料。

remMethod.val: an (无， 不) + hydr (水) + ous → 无水的

trans.tranOther: containing no water, esp no water of crystallization
